name: DISPERSION_PER_GUN_DAMAGE
info: Value that adds to weapon dispersion per weapon damage value.

name: PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA
info: Sets max stamina value of the player.

name: PLAYER_HUNGER_RATE
info: Set base hunger rate per 5 minutes. Default: 0.65

name: PLAYER_THIRST_RATE
info: Set base thirst rate per 5 minutes. Default: 0.65

name: PLAYER_FATIGUE_RATE
info: Set base fatigue rate per 5 minutes. Default: 0.8

name: PLAYER_HEALING_RATE
info: Set base player healing rate per turn. Default: 0.01

name: NPC_HEALING_RATE
info: Set base NPC healing rate per turn. Default: 0.01

name: PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA_PENALTY
info: How much will decrease stamina pool by using 10000 stamina.  Default: 100.  Set to 0 to turn it off.

name: PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA_REGENERATE
info: Stamina pool regenerating rate per turn while sleeping.  Default: 0.2

name: PLAYER_RECOVER_STAMINA_INCREASE_HUNGER
info: How much hunger will be added for recovering 10000 stamina.  Default: 80.  Set to 0 to turn it off.

name: PLAYER_RECOVER_STAMINA_INCREASE_THIRST
info: How much thirst will be added for recovering 10000 stamina.  Default: 80.  Set to 0 to turn it off.

name: PLAYER_RECOVER_STAMINA_INCREASE_FATIGUE
info: How much fatigue will be added for recovering 10000 stamina.  Default: 40.  Set to 0 to turn it off.

name: NO_FAULTS
info: Disables vehicle part faults.  If true, disables vehicle part faults, vehicle parts will be totally reliable unless destroyed, and can only be repaired via replacement.

name: FILTHY_MORALE
info: Morale penalty for filthy clothing.  If true, wearing filthy clothing will cause morale penalties.

name: FILTHY_WOUNDS
info: Infected wounds from filthy clothing.  If true, getting hit in a body part covered in filthy clothing may cause infections.

name: NO_NPC_FOOD
info: Disables tracking food, thirst and ( partially ) fatigue for NPCs. If true, NPCs won't need to eat or drink and will only get tired enough to sleep, not to get penalties.

name: NO_VITAMINS
info: Disables tracking vitamins in food items.  If true, disables vitamin tracking and vitamin disorders.
